dsDescriptionValue.value:
Petition subject: Permission to travel

Original: http://nrs.harvard.edu/urn-3:FHCL:13909127

Date of creation: 17790000

Selected signatures:

  1. Cornelius Durant

Actions taken on dates: 1779-01-07,1779-01-07

Legislative action: Received in the Council on January 7, 1779 and resolved and sent for concurrence and received in the House on January 7, 1779 and read and concurred and consented to

Total signatures: 1

Legislative action summary: Received, resolved, sent, received, read, concurred, consented

Legal voter signatures (males not identified as non-legal): 1

Female only signatures: No

Identifications of signatories: Danish Island of St. Croix merchant

Prayer format was printed vs. manuscript: Manuscript

Additional archivist notes: West Indies, fish, export, certificate

Location of the petition at the Massachusetts Archives of the Commonwealth: Massachusetts Archives volume 220, pages 162-164
